section.title: Cash Register
section.para: After you have selected the Cash Register you want to use, the following screen will appear:
When processing a transaction on the Cash Register, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Indicates the Site the Cash Register is associated with.
Identifies the Cash Register currently being used for processing transactions.
Displays whether the Cash Register is currently active.
Display lists pending Sales associated with the Cash Register—if any.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes Cash Register window without saving changes.
Prints receipt for proposed Sale transaction.
Opens retail Sale screen for new Sales transaction.
Opens pending Sale and allows for editing of transaction.
Opens pending Sale, but does not allowing changes to transaction.
Deletes pending Sales.
Searches for current or past Sales, Quotes or Returns based on date parameters entered by user.

section.para: To conduct maintenance on the Cash Register, select the "Maintenance" tab. The following screen will appear:
When maintaining a Cash Register terminal, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the date and time when the Cash Register terminal was opened.
Select one of the following available options:
Select to open the Cash Register.
Select to close the Cash Register.
Select to post an adjustment to the Cash Register.
Displays the balance of the Cash Register when it was opened.
Displays the current balance of the Cash Register.
Displays total Sales tendered for the Cash Register.
Displays total cash Sales tendered for the Cash Register.
Displays total Credit Card Sales tendered for the Cash Register.
Displays total Check Sales tendered for the Cash Register.
Use the following options to transfer funds from a Bank Account to the Cash Register:
Select bank used to transfer funds in and out of Cash Register terminal.
Specify the amount of funds to transfer in and out of Cash Register terminal.
Select check box if physical checks were deposited into bank account.
Use the following options to perform an adjustment to the Cash Register:
Select bank used to adjust funds in and out of Cash Register terminal.
Displays current balance following bank transfers or adjustments.
Specify any additional notes related specifically to Cash Register terminal.
Select to print receipt which illustrates maintenance transactions which have taken between open and close period.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Select to close the screen.
Select to post the specified transaction.
Select to configure the print options for this screen. For more information, please see .
